column5: LOL Glen....great report!  Glad to hear the repairs were done properly.  Ahhh...the wall is back in your pics...something just wasn't quite right in your shore reports.  We're hoping to take the boat out this weekend with our little one (not looking great at this point), and have her use those sabiki rigs you gave us at Quinte.  Saturday is looking bad...rain/thundershowers and winds up to 50km/h....and Sunday morning plans may put a damper on fishing.  At the least we'll take her to a local pond.  Do they warn you when the dams are going to open?  Is there a strict schedule they follow?  Thanks for the pics and report....nice to see you out there again....hope the temps cool down there soon...so you can put yer shirt back on.....
Glad to see ya back in the saddle Glen
Cripes !...Hitch up your britches there son...you're about to become em-bare-assed...  Nice to see your damn pictures again and you catching fish...
great report glen, glad you got the boat back.
Glen you been workin' out?  You're in pretty good shape for an old timer!  The Fiance's tryin' to whip me into shape for our wedding in august!  Thanks for the report dude!  Cheers, UF
Glad to hear the boats running good Glen, nice fish!

Good to see you got yer boat back and she's all right.  Thanks for the where's waldo the duck adventure, I'll spend the entire afternoon lookin' for that quack.  Nice report, with a build like that, you are a true fish porn star, lol.  reefrunner
Ahh.. Glen and his boat  ! Life is normal again....
the duck was easy to see, but the rabbit is much harder to spot.  Glad the boat is back in working order Glen.
looks like  a good time, regradless of the bite, beautiful colors on kitten fish, on you....not so much,  I did spot the ducky, the little orange legs give it away
congrats on getting the boat back ... the wait must have lasted forever. nice fish too!
Sure am glad you didn`t parade around the shore half nekked! Glad to see you got your ride back and it works Glenn.
*GASP* *CHOKE*  did you get a "brazillian" done there buddy? or where you standing to close to the fire?

Everybody's looking at me cross-eyed..  Coffee.. everywhere.. work.. ruined!!  You been pumping dem guns havn't ya?!!  Chin ups all winter, and then BAAAMMM, lookit me now!  LOL  Your nekid pics are a gruesome reminder of spring.. gruesome, but welcome none the less.  HAHAAH HD

Great to see things are back to somewhat normal Dawg. Those kitties were definitely nicely colored.  Duck wasn't hard to find but it took me a couple of looks before I saw the rabbit in the brush on the left side.  At least you got to fish! Here I am behind the keyboard at work and hoping to get out sunday morning.
Finally, some nekked fish porn.  Its been too long G  Joey
Great report GCD!  Now I was wondering if you could PM me your address.  I need to send you the bill for my new welding hood as the glass has broken on my old one.
A sure sign of spring, Glen.  Lookin mighty buff too.

WTG Dog great to see ya back on the water eventhough you must have been cautious dodging debry.  Did you lose weight or does the white glowing body make you slim.Had to wear my sunglasses to read this report EH
So was I the only one he called while he was fishin???? Nice day to be out bud glad the boat is workin correctly.  Art
All is right with the world again...Glen half nekkid, the wall and fish!   Well done Glen!   Glad to hear the boat is running well, have a great weekend!!
